boards.name: PRAU Standard
boards.jql: project= PRAU and issuetype not in (Epic, subTaskIssueTypes())

boards.name: Jira Admin
boards.jql: project = 'JIRA Administration' and issuetype not in (Epic, Program, subTaskIssueTypes())

boards.name: Yield YSYS
boards.jql: (project = YIELD OR project = YDP and issueFunction in epicsOf('project=YIELD')) and  issuetype not in (Test, Epic, subTaskIssueTypes())

boards.name: PROPT
boards.jql: project = PROPT AND issuetype not in (Epic, Program, subTaskIssueTypes())
